snippet.title: Catizens — Herding Cats Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist and play the demo now → https://bit.ly/CatizensHCT

This gameplay overview trailer for Catizens shows off a few situations you may come across while playing. Each catizen has a distinct personality with unique traits, which means forming an effective team of settlers from a bunch of fluffy catventurers is no small task. But don’t worry, herding cats is fun and easy! It’s easy, right? 

Catizens is developed by Bad Optics, a small development studio based in the US. The game is published by HeroCraft PC and set to release on Steam later this year.
